title: Assassin's Creed Mirage has very reasonable system requirements, thank god
description: Ancient Baghdad won't burn your GPU to a crisp, it seems.

title: Microsoft dismissed Baldur's Gate 3 as a 'second-run Stadia PC RPG' before it released—Larian doesn't blame them
description: A comment in a leaked Microsoft document reveals that the company heavily underestimated Larian's hit RPG.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 2.0's revamped police force is finally good enough
description: Not exactly great, but good.

title: Microsoft would buy Valve 'if opportunity arises,' said Phil Spencer in leaked email
description: But its prime target was Nintendo, according to a 2020 email leaked during the FTC v Microsoft trial.

title: Microsoft leak reveals new Xbox controller with an accelerometer and DualSense-style haptics
description: Codenamed Sebile, the controller will cost $70 and launch next year, if the leaked info pans out.

title: Starfield hero adds New Atlantis map to New Atlantis
description: Well, well, well… by which I mean you can finally find the elevator to the Well without a quest arrow.

description: This is how you're supposed to play Starfield, right?

description: It's time for the best Fallout RPG to get a second chance.

title: Tekken 8 is getting another bigger, better beta next month
description: More characters, modes and some changes from July's beta.

title: Forget Starfield, we were supposed to have an Oblivion remaster by now
description: A 2020 presentation lists a slew of unannounced and unreleased Bethesda games.

title: Elon Musk potentially eyes locking Twitter behind a paywall to combat 'vast armies of bots'
description: It'll surely work this time.

title: Ed Boon wanted every fighter in Mortal Kombat 1 to be played by a famous actor, with Keanu Reeves as Kenshi
description: Wasn't Megan Fox enough?

title: Could we see an Intel Meteor Lake powered PC handheld? 'It's really just up to the OEMs'
description: Meteor Lake may have the graphical grunt for a handheld, but convincing manufacturers to ditch AMD is going to be a long process.

title: Intel's commitment to building GPUs is 'pretty self evident' as Arc lands in Meteor Lake
description: Tom Petersen reiterates Intel's interest in graphics is unwavering.

title: I didn't need a graphics card to play Dying Light 2 on Intel's new laptop chip
description: Though XeSS was key to a playable experience.

title: Here's why Intel's Meteor Lake laptop chips are actually interesting for PC gamers
description: For a mobile chip, Meteor Lake has some exciting developments even for desktop gamers.

title: The Elder Scrolls 6 is at least 3 years away, probably more, and there's bad news for PlayStation fans
description: New documents point to Xbox exclusivity and a release date of 2026 or beyond.

title: Logitech finally assimilates Blue Microphones with a new lineup of Yeti mics under its own name
description: The two new Logitech G microphones use the well-known "Yeti" name but ditch the Blue Microphones branding.

title: How to beat the Puppet of the Future in Lies of P

description: Grab 20 Trail of Cthulhu books at a nearly 95% discount.

description: Use this mysterious policeman's whistle to comfort a sick kid.

title: Whether or not Nvidia really has a chiplet-based RTX 5090 'under investigation' its GPU future has to be multi-chip
description: Rumours suggest it hasn't yet approved a GB101 chiplet version, but that the bulk of Nvidia's next-gen gaming cards will still be monolithic GPUs.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 may be facing some PC performance issues, but hey, at least it's not the terrifyingly hilarious Switch version

description: Seems like the wrong box was left ticked.

title: The Baldur's Gate 3 cast will play their characters in a D&D livestream this week
description: A one-shot with Karlach, Shadowheart, Wyll, Gale, Lae'zel, and Astarion will be streamed Friday on Twitch.

description: Don't sleep on Cyberpunk 2077's revamped cyberware when 2.0 drops.
